summary: Cures any non-volatile status condition (poison, burn, paralysis, sleep, freeze) from a single Pokémon, but consumes the user's turn.
typical_users: Support Pokémon in Doubles/VGC (e.g., Indeedee, Clefairy)
Bulky utility sets in lower tiers
Teams lacking other reliable status removal like Heal Bell/Aromatherapy
